fr.gouv.vitam.tools.sedalib.droid

Class DroidIdentifier

  • Object

extends Object
    The Class DroidIdentifier.

    Singleton class for managing the DROID identifications

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static DroidIdentifier init(SEDALibProgressLogger sedaLibProgressLogger,
                                   String configDir)
                            throws SEDALibException
        Initialises the single instance of DroidIdentifier.
        Parameters:
        sedaLibProgressLogger - the progress logger or null if no progress log expected
        configDir - the config dir
        Returns:
        single instance of DroidIdentifier
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - if the identifier can't be initialised, may be due to wrong signatures files

      • getInstance

        public static DroidIdentifier getInstance()
        Gets the single instance of DroidIdentifier.
        Returns:
        single instance of DroidIdentifier

      • getTriggerPuidByPuid

        public TriggerPuid getTriggerPuidByPuid(String puid)
        Gets the TriggerPuid by puid, or null if no match.

        TriggerPuid gives the link between container identifier and puid of outer format

        Parameters:
        puid - the puid
        Returns:
        the TriggerPuid by puid

      • canAnalyzeContainer

        public boolean canAnalyzeContainer()
        Can use container identification.
        Returns:
        true, if successful

      • getIdentificationResult

        public IdentificationResult getIdentificationResult(Path path)
                                             throws SEDALibException
        Gets the identification result.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of file to identify
        Returns:
        the identification result
        Throws:
        SEDALibException - if the file can't be read

      • selectBestResult

        protected IdentificationResult selectBestResult(List<IdentificationResult> irl,
                                                String fileExtension)
        Select best identification result.

        Use the signature file priorities to sort the different formats, and the extension to select the best format if there are more than one with no priority at the higher level.

        Parameters:
        irl - the list of all identification results
        fileExtension - the file extension of original file
        Returns:
        the best identification result, or null if the list was empty
